skills.name: Wolf Companion
skills.description: Special - Hunt with your faithful wolves.

skills.name: Lion Stance
skills.description: Stance - Increase damage dealt and damage received.

skills.name: Ancient Blood
skills.description: Passive - Increases your life and attack rating.

skills.name: Hunter's Mark
skills.description: Upgrade - Your wolves expose weaknesses in enemy defenses.

skills.name: Snake Stance
skills.description: Stance - Imbues weapons with deadly poison damage.

skills.name: Mountain King
skills.description: Passive - Increases strength, dexterity, vitality and energy.

skills.name: Bear Stance
skills.description: Stance - Greatly increases defensive fortitude.

skills.name: Wolven Guide
skills.description: Upgrade - Being near your wolves increases your power.

skills.name: Eagle Stance
skills.description: Stance - Replenish the body and focus the elements.

skills.name: Primordial Hunt
skills.description: Upgrade - Your wolves reduce elemental defences instead of physical.

skills.name: Wolf Stance
skills.description: Stance - Increases attack, hit recovery and movement speed.

skills.name: Earthquake
skills.description: Attack - Unleash a tremor followed by an aftershock.

skills.name: Upheaval
skills.description: Upgrade - Adds physical damage to your Thunder Slam.

skills.name: Thunder Slam
skills.description: Attack - Blast out a stunning thunderclap.

skills.name: Leap
skills.description: Warp - Jump over your foes.

skills.name: Heart of Stone
skills.description: Passive - Amplifies your physical prowess and nullifies your elemental power.

skills.name: Tectonics
skills.description: Upgrade - Your Earthquakes trigger Shower of Rocks if powerful enough.

skills.name: Shower of Rocks
skills.description: Attack - A cascade of rocks, damaging and weakening enemies.

skills.name: Aftermath
skills.description: Upgrade - Shower of Rocks is improved by the might of Arreat.

skills.name: Whirlwind
skills.description: Attack - Become one with the wind in a dance of death.

skills.name: Precision
skills.description: Upgrade - Makes your Whirlwind attacks more accurate.

skills.name: Savagery
skills.description: Upgrade - Adds deadly strike to your attacks during Whirlwind.

skills.name: Stoneskin
skills.description: Upgrade - Increases your defense during Whirlwind.

skills.name: Lifestealer
skills.description: Upgrade - Whirlwind attacks restore life.

skills.name: Executioner
skills.description: Upgrade - Improves Whirlwind if wielding a two handed weapon.

skills.name: Gale Force
skills.description: Upgrade - Your Whirlwind attacks splash to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Conflux
skills.description: Buff - Sacrifice physical prowess for elemental power.

skills.name: Iron Spiral
skills.description: Attack - A vortex of blades shreds the enemy.

skills.name: Galvanism
skills.description: Upgrade - Empowers Iron Spiral and Thunderstorm.

skills.name: Elemental Overload
skills.description: Passive - Grants elemental absorption after using a signature skill.

skills.name: Thunderstorm
skills.description: Projectile - Electrocutes a large area around you.

skills.name: Deep Freeze
skills.description: Attack - A concentrated burst of deadly ice.

skills.name: Purifying Flame
skills.description: Buff - A restorative cleansing.

skills.name: Primordial Strike
skills.description: Attack - Discharge the power of the elements.

skills.name: Stampede
skills.description: Projectile - Throw multiple axes in a deadly volley.

skills.name: Snake Bite
skills.description: Projectile - Throwing axe attack that stuns and poisons.

skills.name: Overkill
skills.description: Projectile - Throw a massive shower of axes over a narrow area.

skills.name: Bloodthirst
skills.description: Passive - Additional bonuses from life steal depending on your stance.

skills.name: Mighty Vigor
skills.description: Passive - Your strength increases your bloodthirst.

skills.name: Unyielding
skills.description: Passive - Gain phyisical resistance after being hit.

skills.name: Aptitude
skills.description: Passive - Your combat stance becomes more effective with experience.

skills.name: Pillage
skills.description: Passive - Find extra loot when you slay monsters.

skills.name: Warder
skills.description: Passive - Protects you from damage for a short time after blocking.

skills.name: Fortress
skills.description: Projectile - Summons a ring of deadly axe thrower towers around you.

skills.name: Citadel
skills.description: Upgrade - Increases your maximum block chance.

skills.name: Guardian Spirit
skills.description: Summon - A spirit who attacks enemies with axe skills.

skills.name: Defender Spirit
skills.description: Summon - A spirit who attacks in melee and takes damage for you.

skills.name: Protector Spirit
skills.description: Summon - A spirit who attacks in melee and buffs the party

skills.name: Shamanic Trance
skills.description: Passive - Improves the combat prowess of your ancient spirits.

skills.name: Spirit Reave
skills.description: Attack - Magic damage over time melee attack.

skills.name: Spirit Walk
skills.description: Warp - Teleports you and your minions on target enemy, healing you.

skills.name: Ancestral Endurance
skills.description: Upgrade - Increases your damage mitigation after using Spirit Reave.

skills.name: Spirit Bond
skills.description: Upgrade - Spirit Reave's duration increases with your summon count.

skills.name: Meditation
skills.description: Passive - Increases your maximum mana and mana regeneration.

skills.name: Purity
skills.description: Passive - Protects you against poison damage and curses.

skills.name: Melee Devotion
skills.description: Passive - A melee exclusive layer of damage protection.

skills.name: Freedom
skills.description: Passive - Increases defensive speeds and reduces chilled duration.

skills.name: Tenacity
skills.description: Passive - Increases physical resistance.

skills.name: Endurance
skills.description: Passive - Increases your maximum life.

skills.name: Continuity
skills.description: Passive - Increases the duration of your buff/debuff skills.

skills.name: Specialization
skills.description: Passive - Increases the skill cap of your activate [Non-Ultimate] Abilities.

skills.name: Chemistry
skills.description: Passive - Increases potion effectiveness compared to other sustain.

skills.name: Immortal
skills.description: Passive - Avoid attacks in battle and recover more quickly.

skills.name: Thundergod
skills.description: Buff - Your attacks stun the target and you emit stun novas.

skills.name: Nephalem Spirit
skills.description: Passive - Enhance your weapons with ancestral elemental power.

skills.name: Runemaster
skills.description: Passive - Grants a total defense bonus for each rune equipped.

skills.name: Gladiator's Dominance
skills.description: Passive - Improves both offensive and defensive prowess.

skills.name: Paragon of Fate
skills.description: Passive - High level bonuses tied to Heroic Library of Fate progression.

skills.name: Paragon of Sanctity
skills.description: Passive - High level bonuses tied to Heroic Duncraig progression.
